```{r include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
library(ggmap)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery') %>%
  setView(lat=-22.4097049, lng= -48.4977339, zoom = 11)  %>%
  addMarkers(lat=-22.4097049, lng= -48.4977339, popup="Maunga Whau")
```
